summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation and the offer of Jayne M. Perkins as Executrix of the Will of Clinton R. Perkins, deceased to sell Lot 10 and a portion of Lot 11, Block 106, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition to The City of Seattle (Volume 6 of Plats, page 40, Records of King County, Washington) on which are situated the Normandy Apartments, to The City of Seattle; and amending Section 1 of Ordinance 102431 to properly identify the source of reimbursement of an appropriation from the Emergency Fund.
